name: Lost In Space (itch) (BraveChickenEntertainment)
description:
A path-finding puzzle game located in space!

Find a way to make a space man travel through 45 unique and challenging galaxies while not only finding the right way, but also dodging various obstacles or taking advantage of some,collecting keys to unlock directional bases and much more. Go in another galaxy in least possible time to collect as much stars as you can as you will need them to unlock special red galaxies.

FEATURES

- Intuitive touch controls

- 45 mind-bending levels

- Challenges: Complete levels in short time to collect up to 3 stars and unlock red galaxies

- Original soundtracks
